description: Motion-analytics-toolkit pattern language: formalizes module relationships as a validated, topologically sorted DAG with coverage analysis.

patterns.name: Grounding Foundation
patterns.problem: Motion labels lack embodied semantics when assigned without conceptual grounding criteria.
patterns.solution: Establish Lakoff-style grounding criteria and ICMs before any perceptual or analytic processing.

patterns.name: Image Schema Detection
patterns.problem: Raw telemetry contains implicit spatial-temporal gestalts that are lost without structured detection.
patterns.solution: Detect image schemas (containment, path, balance, force) from telemetry before feature extraction.

patterns.name: Behavioral Feature Extraction
patterns.problem: Downstream archetype matching and lattice construction require standardized behavioral features.
patterns.solution: Extract gait, energetics, and kinematic features into a common Beer-framework profile.

patterns.name: Archetype Matching
patterns.problem: Behavioral profiles are meaningless without mapping to conceptual archetypes.
patterns.solution: Match extracted features against grounded archetype library using structural transfer.

patterns.name: Lattice Construction
patterns.problem: Individual motion profiles cannot reveal population-level structure without spatial embedding.
patterns.solution: Construct a semantic cellular automaton lattice from Beer features for neighborhood analysis.

patterns.name: Cluster Identification
patterns.problem: Lattice structure alone does not reveal emergent groupings or phase boundaries.
patterns.solution: Apply cluster and boundary detection to identify emergent motion families.

patterns.name: Stress Testing
patterns.problem: High-performing motions may fail under environmental perturbation.
patterns.solution: Run scenario suites to evaluate robustness and vulnerability before governance.

patterns.name: Violation Auditing
patterns.problem: Archetype assignments can violate grounding constraints without systematic auditing.
patterns.solution: Audit all archetype-motion mappings for metaphor violations and constraint breaches.

patterns.name: Coverage Reporting
patterns.problem: Progress is hard to evaluate without integrated pattern and quality diagnostics.
patterns.solution: Generate reports that summarize pattern coverage, tier breakdown, and dependency completeness.
